name: I knew he can see my fear. So I held my breath.
name_original: I knew he can see my fear. So I held my breath.
description:
This is Interactive Cinema and Non-linear Narrative course's project.

This project detects the audience's pose to interact with the audience through Teachable Machine(https://teachablemachine.withgoogle.com/)'s pose model.

Putting the left hand over the mouth will be detected as a Silent pose. Other poses will be detected as neutral poses. Audiences can use their poses to switch between two parallel videos and trigger different endings of this short story.

The model is not too accurate, so, please face the camera and place your head in the center of the camera screen. 

This title is generated by InferKit(https://app.inferkit.com/demo)
